thread.title: Jerry Akaminko returns to action after 17 months out; Boost for Ghana's 2018 FIFA World Cup qualifiers
thread.title_full: Jerry Akaminko returns to action after 17 months out; Boost for Ghana's 2018 FIFA World Cup qualifiers

title: Jerry Akaminko returns to action after 17 months out; Boost for Ghana's 2018 FIFA World Cup qualifiers
text:
14:25 CET Jerry Akaminko returns to action after 17 months out; Boost for Ghana's 2018 FIFA World Cup qualifiers - www.ghanasoccernet.com Jerry Akaminko 
Ghana defender Jerry Akaminko played his first competitive match in 17 months after lasting the entire duration in Eskisehirspor's 1-0 defeat at Akhisar Belediye on Sunday. 
The centre-back has struggled to regain his form since suffering a knee injury last May in a Ghana pre-2014 FIFA World Cup friendly against the Netherlands. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
